message.entry: The style value ''{0}'' is incorrect for the banner region ''{1}''.\nC++ comments style is not permitted when the target language is C.
Tag ''{0}'' is found inside a tag pair in the \ncode generation template file: ''{1}''.\nAn end tag ''{2}'' may be missing.
The code generation template file: {0} is not found.\nVerify that the file is on the MATLAB path or specify a different file.
The end tag ''{0}'' is missing in code generation template file: {1}.\nYou must have an end tag for every start tag.
The banner type ''{0}'' is an invalid banner type in the code generation template file: ''{1}''.\nValid banner types are: 'FileBanner', 'FunctionBanner', 'SharedUtilityBanner' and 'FileTrailer'.
Invalid attribute ''{0}'' on line {1,number,integer} of the \ncode generation template file: ''{2}''.\nValid attributes are 'style' and 'width'.

The format of tag ''{0}'' is invalid.
The error is on line {1,number,integer} in the code generation template file: ''{2}''.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">
banner content
</Banner>

The format of attribute ''{0}'' is invalid.
The error is on line {1,number,integer} in the code generation template file: ''{2}''.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">
banner content
</Banner>

The attribute value ''{0}'' is missing quotes.
The error is on line {1,number,integer} in the code generation template file: ''{2}''.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">banner content</Banner>
Attempt to create a ''{0}'' section when no specification for it exists in the code generation template file.
Incorrect value for Banner Style: ''{0}''.\nChoose one value from the following available styles: \n'classic','box','open_box','doxygen','doxygen_qt''
Incorrect value for Banner Width: ''{0}''.\nThe value entered should be an integer value in the range 60-120.
Attempt to assign incorrect data type to Banner Style. \nValue should be of type character vector or BannerStyle Enumeration.
Attempt to get the Token-value of non-existent Token ''{0}''. \nSet this token's value first, using the setTokenValue() method.
The CodeTemplate property must be scalar or empty of class ''{0}''.
Failed to apply the ''{0}'' method to the CodeTemplate.
Failed to apply the ''{0}'' method to the CodeTemplate: {1}
The section named ''{0}'' is not found in the code generation template file {1}.

The format of tag ''{0}'' is invalid.
The error is in the code generation template file: ''{1}''.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">
banner content
</Banner>
Invalid attribute ''{0}'' for section ''{1}'' of the \ncode generation template file: ''{2}''.\nValid attributes are 'style' and 'width'.

The format of attribute ''{0}'' is invalid.
The error is for section ''{1}'' in the code generation template file: ''{2}''.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">
banner content
</Banner>

The attribute value ''{0}'' is missing quotes.
The error is for section ''{1}'' in the code generation template file: ''{2}''.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">
banner content
</Banner>

Multiple tags ''{0}'' detected on the same line of the CGT file: {1}.
An example of correct format is: 
<Banner style="classic">
banner content
</Banner>
The return type of the function call-Back ''{0}'' should be of type 'char'.

The function callback ''{0}'' is causing an error because it does not meet one of the following conditions: 
 1.) Cannot be a MATLAB built-in function. 
 2.) Must be on the path or present working directory. 
 3.) Must take in only the tokenMap input argument.
